ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'unsweetened almond milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'frozen banana, sliced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'powdered peanut butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'cocoa powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cinnamon'}

steps: Process the watermelon and milk together in a blender until smooth. Add the sugar and blend another 10 seconds to incorporate. Serve immediately.

name: Green Monster Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fat-free milk'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fat-free plain yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'banana, frozen and chunked'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'natural peanut butter'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice cubes (Optional)'}

name: Lela's Protein Mango Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango, chopped, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'low-fat vanilla yogurt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'almond milk'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'scoop', 'name': 'vanilla whey protein powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'honey, or to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Blend mango, yogurt, almond milk, ice, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

name: Healthy Blueberry Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Greek yogurt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cinnamon, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}

name: All-Fruit Smoothies
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'banana, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen blueberries'}
steps: Pour pineapple juice into a blender and add banana, strawberries, and blueberries. Cover and blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses.

name: Mangonada
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chamoy (Mexican chili fruit condiment)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili-lime seasoning (such as Tajin)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mango chunks, frozen'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chamoy (Mexican chili fruit condiment)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili-lime seasoning (such as Tajin)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'diced fresh mango'}
steps: Place 1 teaspoon chamoy on a plate. Place 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning on another plate. Dip rim of glass first in chamoy, then in chili-lime seasoning. Set aside.. Combine frozen mango, water, and lime juice in a blender; blend until smooth.. Place 1/2 tablespoon chamoy in the bottom of the glass. Add 1/2 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning and 1/2 of the blended mangoes. Repeat layers and top with diced fresh mango.

name: Creamy Mango Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cold milk'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vanilla yogurt'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped fresh mango'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Blend the milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, mango, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth and creamy.

name: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'nectarines, pitted and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'banana, cut into pieces and frozen'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'orange, peeled and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vanilla yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'honey'}
steps: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

name: Berries and Cream Smoothie
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen blueberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen strawberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen raspberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen blackberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}
steps: Pour cream and half-and-half into an electric blender and blend on low speed until it begins to thicken. Add sugar and vanilla extract and mix for about 30 seconds. Add blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, and blackberries. Blend until smooth, adding milk if necessary to make blending easier.

name: Banana Smoothie I
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'banana'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}
steps: In a blender, combine banana, milk, vanilla, egg and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and top with a pinch of cinnamon.
